name: Raw Vegan Brownie Bites (grain free)
description: 5 Ingredient Raw Vegan Brownie Bites! These brownie balls are fudgy, quick to make, and make a great snack. 7 Gm Protein. No Bake, Paleo Brownie Energy Bites. Vegan Gluten-free Grain-free Recipe

video.name: RAW VEGAN BROWNIE BITES -  5 Ingr Energy Bites, Grainfree | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
5 Ingredient Raw Vegan Brownie Bites! These brownie balls are FUDGY, quick to make, and make a great snack. No Bake, Paleo Energy Bites
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2019/08/raw-vegan-brownie-bites.html
INDIAN KITCHEN BOOK: https://veganricha.com/vegan-richas-indian-kitchen-cookbook
EVERYDAY KITCHEN BOOK: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen

These brownie bites are perefect for a decadent snack or instant dessert! A Mix of nuts make up the base for a rich fudgy snack with a good amount of cocoa. Dates are the binder and sweetener. The bites mixture takes just 5 mins and then shape them as you like into balls or bars. Add toppings of choice and snack for the energy boost or for when you want a lighter brownie!

Make a double batch of these and freeze for later! Add other nuts or seeds or some protein powder for variation. Great for the weekend travel, Hiking, road trip and back to school.

Music: "Delusional" from Epidemic Sound.

#veganricha #easyveganrecipes #veganbrowniebites #veganecipes #veganchannel

recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp shredded coconut (, preferably lightly toasted)
1/3 cup cocoa powder (plus more for rolling, I use dutch processed)
12  soft dates ((any medium to large soft dates. Use 11 to 12 depending on size))
2-3 tsp hemp seeds or coconut or cocoa powder or chia seeds for coating

recipeInstructions.text: Add the nuts and coconut to a processor and process until the nuts become an even fine meal.*
recipeInstructions.name: Add the nuts and coconut to a processor and process until the nuts become an even fine meal.*

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cocoa powder and process again to combine well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cocoa powder and process again to combine well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dates and salt and process again until the dates have broken down and the mixture is homogeneous. It will take a minute. The dates will break down then the mixture will become doughy. If there are pieces of dates visible, then push the dough down and pulse and process again. Check If the mixture is sticky enough, if not then add a tsp of oil or maple syrup and pulse.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dates and salt and process again until the dates have broken down and the mixture is homogeneous. It will take a minute. The dates will break down then the mixture will become doughy. If there are pieces of dates visible, then push the dough down and pulse and process again. Check If the mixture is sticky enough, if not then add a tsp of oil or maple syrup and pulse.

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop portions of the dough to roll into balls. Press the balls in bowls of hemp seeds, coconut or chia seed, or cocoa powder to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Scoop portions of the dough to roll into balls. Press the balls in bowls of hemp seeds, coconut or chia seed, or cocoa powder to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Store on the counter for upto 3 days. refrigerate for upto 3 weeks or freeze for upto 2 months.
recipeInstructions.name: Store on the counter for upto 3 days. refrigerate for upto 3 weeks or freeze for upto 2 months.

keywords: brownie bits recipe, chocolate brownie bites, grain free brownie bites, no bake brownie bites, raw brownie bites
